testCase.name: WebPlatform notification support supportsNotifications returns false when platform does not support notifications
WebPlatform notification support supportsNotifications returns true when platform supports notifications
WebPlatform notification support maySendNotifications returns true when notification permissions are not granted
WebPlatform notification support maySendNotifications returns true when notification permissions are granted
WebPlatform notification support requests notification permissions and returns result
WebPlatform pollForUpdate() getAppVersion returns normalized app version
WebPlatform pollForUpdate() pollForUpdate() should return not available and call showNoUpdate when current version matches most recent version
WebPlatform pollForUpdate() pollForUpdate() should strip v prefix from versions before comparing
WebPlatform pollForUpdate() pollForUpdate() should return ready and call showUpdate when current version differs from most recent version
WebPlatform pollForUpdate() pollForUpdate() should return ready without showing update when user registered in last 24
WebPlatform pollForUpdate() pollForUpdate() should return error when version check fails
